name: Zig Zag (itch) (Daineffable)
description:
Zig Zag is a simple game to pass the time.  Reach for high scores with simple controls against the randomly generated rounds that increasingly get more difficult the further you get.  If you're on the go you can take Zig Zag to-go by downloading the android app from the Google Play store as well!

Controls:
-Press 'Spacebar' to turn
-Press 'Up Arrow' to jump

In all seriousness, this was my first Unity game that was made completely from scratch and I wanted to show it off. I plan to add more to it, but it is ready to play so I thought I'd put it up for review/recommendations.
